snippet: Mylan, the maker of the epinephrine injector EpiPen, is expanding its marketing efforts in the face of new, competing devices and the surging rates of allergies in children.
abstract: Mylan, the maker of the epinephrine injector EpiPen, is expanding its marketing efforts in the face of new, competing devices and surging rates of allergies in children that have led several states to require public schools to keep the devices on hand.
lead_paragraph: Mylan, the maker of the epinephrine injector EpiPen, is expanding its marketing efforts in the face of new, competing devices and the surging rates of allergies in children.

headline.seo: Mylan Invests in EpiPen as Child Allergies Increase
headline.main: Tiny Lifesaver for a Growing Worry
headline.print_headline: Tiny Lifesaver for a Growing Worry
